website_summaries.verdict: Evolve is a welcome evolution from the Turtle Rock Studios team and a refreshing kind of title that you likely haven't experienced before, introducing excellent four-versus-one action that can be enjoyed on- or offline.
pros: Evolve is a great team-based co-op or offline game where players can work together to take down a giant creature or play as the beast themselves
It looks gorgeous and really shines on a high-end gaming PC
cons: Evolve requires a healthy amount of practice to find your bearings
Occasionally players might find themselves in a frustrating game of chase during a round

customer_reviews.title: Great game. Still playable even after being killed.
customer_reviews.text: This game was ahead of its time. Play as the monster and wage a guerrilla war against 4 hunters or take on the role of a hunter and team up to take down a horrific abomination. 1 v 4 gameplay that still looks amazing even after all this time. The company may have shut down their servers and everyone may get a free 'upgrade' to Evolve: stage 2... but you can go back to playing the (mostly) functional game via Steam settings and selecting the option to not play the beta (Stage:2). Then it's just P2P gameplay or bots, but dang is it still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kimudo

customer_reviews.title: Great Game, Too Much Reliance on DLC
customer_reviews.text: Great game, a lot of fun both online and single player though I prefer to play against the bots. Supposedly more monsters and hunters coming out. However, it is heavily DLC based. I recommend waiting for the price to drop a lot and getting all of the DLC or waiting for a package to come out besides the Hunting Season pass or other option. Skins are not worth it unless you're a die hard fan but extra monsters and hunters adds replay value. Worth a shot if you're thinking about it.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro P.

customer_reviews.title: A good game ruined by bad DLC practices
customer_reviews.text: A good game with good mechanics, and a microscopic community. The DLC model for this game drove players away, and the servers are ghost towns, but what I was able to play was enjoyable, and could easily draw a crowd if the price was constantly 10-15 dollars, or even free-to-play.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Well, it's a dead game now so...
customer_reviews.text: Great game to bad its dead, could have been amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Game will not install from disc!!!! Install creates a directory on local hard drive and then starts an automatic 20Gb download from STEAM for Evolve Stage 2. Searched forums and found this is a common problem for this game and STEAM!!!! Blew my data cap in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: rpinpm

customer_reviews.title: Game would not install
customer_reviews.text: Put 1st disc in drive, it was recognized, almost immediately, asked for the 2nd disc, put that in, same, asked for the 3rd disc. Did not install a thing. I tried 3 times, in two different disc drives. Not sure, but, looks to me like I was sent "copies" of the original. Also, I cant remember having a game that came with 4 dvd discs, usually 1, maybe 2. Sent back today.

customer_reviews.text: This is a good game, however I suggest having a high end PC for it. The tutorials run fine, but the game, infuriating lag the moment anything exciting happens.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy your ill gotten gains, you worthless cheats!
customer_reviews.text: Bough this game near release, for a stupid high price. Less than 6 months later they completely change the game through an update and make it free to play!? the very definition of a "bait and switch". This will be the last product I buy from 2K.

customer_reviews.title: This game was a real disappointment for me
customer_reviews.text: This game was a real disappointment for me. I was hoping 2K would come out with a follow up classic to Borderlands 2.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with Evolve months before it came out
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with Evolve months before it came out, just watching the trailers. I got it almost right after it came out and thoroughly enjoyed it. I am in the process of getting three stars for every character. The nice thing is, it takes some time so it's not like the goals will be met immediately. However there are a ton of achievements to keep you interested. I don't think I need to speak on the gameplay aspect a whole lot since there are literally thousands of others who have. I love the thrill of the hunt, and I love getting used to every different class.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: would not work
customer_reviews.text: got this for my son and it would not work right total waste of my money. Maybe it is our computer or internet speed but it did not work for us.

customer_reviews.text: It was disappointing, I played for a little while and got bored fast
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nicolas Becerra Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great game, definitly buy
customer_reviews.text: Great concept with good execution. All the roles are fun to play and all the characters are unique. A little video happy, and i would say the monster is a little weak, but other than that great game. Don't listen to people complain about the DLC. The DLC is just a way for people who didn't buy the "Legendary" edition to get the same things. Personally I prefer it that way. As for the extra skins, maybe a little over priced, but its just a skin, its not like it actually changes the game play or something.
customer_reviews.author: Jamcdonald120

customer_reviews.title: Great game. Needs has some issues with the wraith ...
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Needs has some issues with the wraith being too powerful but it's a lot of fun even in single player.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: if you want to play it with 3 of your ...
customer_reviews.text: if you want to play it with 3 of your friends go for it. Otherwise don't. Also the game lack content. The price should be lower for what you get.

customer_reviews.title: Can't play on a laptop. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my son is unable to play this on his laptop. It tells you to out in a certain code and when he does it says not valid in the United States.
customer_reviews.author: Jeckert

customer_reviews.title: Really enjoyable so far
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this game. No haven't bought many PC games and shooters aren't really my thing but the hype got me to purchase this one and I'm so glad I did. I cannot comment on the cost comparatively to other pc games but I felt in just the week I've played I've gotten my moneies worth. Epic playing as a monster and the thrill of combating 4 other people is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Free-to-play game disguised as a AAA title.
customer_reviews.text: This is a cash grab free-to-play game with a $60 price tag and lots of DLC add-ons. Matchmaking is troublesome and you seldom get to play the character you want. Lots of bugs and glitchy terrain traversal. Imbalanced monsters. Also, Amazon did not fulfill on their preorder bonus until a week after the game released, and I had to write them multiple times, during which I unlocked what was promised in the preorder bonus, effectively wasting time grinding out unlocks I should have already had. Don't waste your time or money; go play something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Thompson

customer_reviews.title: honest review
customer_reviews.text: One of the best games I have ever played. That's the truth as good as the trailer looks.
customer_reviews.author: liam tollenger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, couldn't even get started. Had to sign up for some site. Just a pain, had to return

customer_reviews.title: pay to win ruins multiplayer online
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying the entire game for 60 bucks. After playing it looks like I bought half the game. Unless you pay for everything expect to lose matches against people who have paid for all the add ones to ensure winning. This aspect makes the game very disappointing and unplayable as an online multiplayer. The other half is roughly 60 bucks to get. Last game I buy from 2k or Turtlerock.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Beware - understand ALL requirements before proceeding
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Son very disappointed. REQUIRES high-end video graphics card, and if you don't have the correct hardware, it DOES NOT WORK.

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: The game would not load on my lap top. I did not see where the game is not compatible with Microsoft 8.1, Wasted money.

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Game is in 64 bit, not 32. could not play it on my computer. had to return it. Glad I did, its an online game, not a computer game so it would cost a lot of money to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M. Hatin

customer_reviews.title: DLC, why care?
customer_reviews.text: I played in the closed beta for this game and loved it. You don't have to buy all the skins so why care. It doesn't affect the game play anyways so why care so much. This game is worth my $60 and 1:1 dollar to hour ratio by a long shot. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Winans

customer_reviews.title: ... alpha and then the Beta and this game is GREAT! If you are alone you can play the ...
customer_reviews.text: I played the alpha and then the Beta and this game is GREAT! If you are alone you can play the monster, if you have friends play the hunter group. It's so much fun and the only game like it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

product_meta.title: Evolve - PC
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:Standard

View larger THE EVOLUTION OF MULTIPLAYER
In a savage world of man vs nature, are you the hunter or the hunted? The creators of Left 4 Dead, Turtle Rock Studios, bring you Evolve, the next-generation of multiplayer shooters where four hunters face-off against a single, player-controlled monster. Stalk your prey, execute your attack and prove you are the apex predator in adrenaline-pumping 4v1 matches.








View larger 4V1
Grab three friends and hunt the monster or stalk the humans as the evolving beast. Whichever side you choose, you will have access to powerful weapons and abilities that deliver balanced, competitive gameplay.

View larger HUNT TOGETHER OR DIE ALONE
Choose a hunter that fits your play style. Whether you play as the Trapper, Support, Assault, or Medic, every role is vital and teamwork is key in surviving an encounter with the monster.

View larger BEAST OF PREY
As the monster – the lone predator – you are the boss battle. Use savage abilities and an animalistic sense to wreak havoc, kill the humans and prove you are the dominant species.

View larger SAVAGE PLANET
Neither flora nor fauna are friendly on planet Shear. Fall victim to natural hazards or use them strategically against your prey.

View larger CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION
Level up to unlock new upgrades, skins and perks for your favorite class: hunter or monster. Earn your infamy on the leaderboards and become the apex predator.
feature_bullets: 4V1-Grab three friends and hunt the monster or stalk the humans as the evolving beast. Whichever side you choose, you will have access to powerful weapons and abilities that deliver balanced, competitive gameplay.

Hunt Together or Die Alone- Choose a hunter that fits your play style. Whether you play as the Trapper, Support, Assault, or Medic, every role is vital and teamwork is key in surviving an encounter with the monster.
Beast of Prey -As the monster -the lone predator -you are the boss battle. Use savage abilities and an animalistic sense to wreak havoc, kill the humans and prove you are the dominant species.
Savage Planet-Neither flora nor fauna are friendly on planet Shear. Fall victim to natural hazards or use them strategically against your prey.
Character Customization- Level up to unlock new upgrades, skins and perks for your favorite class: hunter or monster. Earn your infamy on the leaderboards and become the apex predator.
